title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Setting boundaries with your leisure time might be complicated today. You want to treat yourself right, but you run the risk of overindulgence with hedonistic Venus cavorting in your 6th House of Health and Routines. You are tempted to relax and chill in the middle of the day, and its difficult to find proper motivation to stay on task. Shaming yourself for satisfying your sweet tooth or indulging in an extra-long nap isnt helpful. Cut yourself some slack; trust that you can reset your moderation meter and recommit to your disciplined aspirations after your break is over. Balance is essential for your success. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
